You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesW W] > &wopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Wopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D54E.
  * `&wopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D568.
